name.ja: <ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>侵<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>食<rt>しょく</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send 1 face-up Level 4 or lower Fiend Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Add 1 Level 10 Fiend Type Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, you can only attack with Maximum Monsters.
